page.title: 11RECREATION
page.content: Gardening and television viewing are the mort popular recreational activities.Films,sport,soap operas,nature being the programmes people most liked to watch. Most of the residents in the area attended functions in the village hall.Only 2 people attended an evening class and 4 studied at home. The Theatre,Cinema,Sport and Leisure Centre were not often visited because of the long travel involved and lack of public transport. Visits to a swimming pool were an exception,several people were prepared to travel to take their children to the swimming baths.
